dialogue.line: We value our allied relationship, but we cannot compromise our own safety and security.

dialogue.speaker: West
dialogue.line: I'm glad we could come to an agreement on a token gift of wealth and a small, balanced trade. However, I must admit that our last few interactions have left me wondering if we're on the same page regarding our priorities.

dialogue.speaker: East
dialogue.line: We appreciate your offer, but we need time to focus on rebuilding our food reserves before considering any significant trades or gifts.

dialogue.speaker: West
dialogue.line: I respect your priorities and understand that you must protect your own interests. Perhaps a small token of good faith could help ease tensions and demonstrate our commitment to the allied relationship?

trade.reason: token of good faith
